TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChannelDispatcherCollection extends System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection`1<class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase>
Public Class ChannelDispatcherCollection Inherits SynchronizedCollection(Of ChannelDispatcherBase)

summary.span: 提供包含通道發送器的安全執行緒 (Thread-Safe) 集合。

span.span: Provides a thread-safe collection that contains channel dispatchers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用這個集合來管理與主機相關聯的通道發送器。This collection is used by to manage the channel dispatchers associated with the host. 當呼叫 ，而集合可以使用 屬性進行存取時，便會建立 。A is created when is called and the collection can be accessed using the property. 集合包含物件 (不只是執行個體和) 因為也會使用的開發人員想要保留[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]程式設計模型，但是更換系統提供之執行階段。The collection contains objects (and not just instances of ) because it is also used by developers who want to keep the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]programming model but replace the system-provided runtime. 他們會藉由覆寫 以及將衍生自 的類別執行個體加入至 ，從 衍生類別並擴充 (繼承自 )。They derive a class from and extend (which inherits from ) by overriding , adding instances of the class derived from to . 這個類別沒有公用建構函式 (Constructor)，而且無法在 以外使用。This class has no public constructors and is not intended to be used outside of the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void ClearItems() cil managed

summary.span: 從集合移除所有通道發送器。

span.span: Removes all channel dispatchers from the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InsertItem (int index, System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase item);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InsertItem(int32 index, class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase item) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub InsertItem (index As Integer, item As ChannelDispatcherBase)
protected: override void InsertItem(int index, System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::ChannelDispatcherBase ^ item);

param.name: index
param.span: 要從集合擷取之通道發送器的索引 (以零起始)。

span.span: The zero-based index of the channel dispatcher to be retrieved from the collection.

param.name: item
param.span: 要插入至集合成為其中項目的通道發送器。

span.span: The channel dispatcher to be inserted into the collection as an element.

summary.span: 將通道發送器插入至集合中指定的索引位置。

span.span: Inserts a channel dispatcher into the collection at a specified index.

exception.span: 與通道發送器集合相關聯的服務主機已關閉。

span.span: The service host associated with the channel dispatcher collection is closed.

exception.span: 指定的 小於零或大於集合中的項目數。

span.span: The specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.

exception.span: 通訊物件未處於某個狀態中。

span.span: The commutation object is not in a state
